name: Category Banner Management for Woocommerce
author: DoubleDome Digital Marketing

sections.description:
The plugin provides you with the capability to seamlessly integrate or upload image banners onto your WooCommerce product category pages with or without a link. This means you have the flexibility to upload any image of your choice to serve as a visually captivating banner in WooCommerce, positioned at the top of each category page. The plugin also allows you to add a link to the category banner image and set it to open in a new tab. Whether you’re looking to display categories in WooCommerce or create category banners, this plugin makes it simple. It supports banners in WordPress, making it easy to manage WooCommerce product categories. You can display products by category in WooCommerce and show categories on the shop page. This feature is perfect for those looking to enhance the WooCommerce product categories page with visually appealing banners while ensuring an easy-to-use, customizable experience in WordPress.

PLUGIN FUNCTIONALITY

  1. User-friendly interface
  2. Enable or disable banners for specific categories
  3. Add link to the banner and set it to open in new tab
  4. Fully responsive for desktop and mobile usability

Support

Do you have questions or issues with Category Banner Management for Woocommerce by DoubleDome Digital Marketing Setup? Please send an email to pluginsupport@doubledome.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire category-banner-management-for-woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What WordPress version is this Plugin compatible with?

  • Category Banner Management for Woocommerce Plugin is compatible from WordPress 5.3 to 6.6.2

What WooCommerce version is this Plugin compatible with?

  • Category Banner Management for Woocommerce Plugin is compatible from Woocommerce 4.0.0 to 9.2.3

Is it compatible with Astra theme?

  • Yes, Category Banner Management for Woocommerce Plugin is compatible with Astra theme.
sections.changelog:

  • Tested and verified on WordPress 6.6.2 and Woocommerce 9.2.3

1.2

  • Added Feature to add link to the banner image and set it to open in new tab.
  • Tested and verified on WordPress 6.5.4 and Woocommerce 8.9.2.

1.1

  • Tested and verified on WordPress 6.5.2 and Woocommerce 8.7.0.

1.0

  • Initial release of the plugin.
